channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Black And Blue
channel.desc: Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller 2019 A rookie officer faces a threat to her life after witnessing a murder involving corrupt officers. She races against time to expose them within 12 hours using footage captured on her own camera. Naomie Harris, Tyrese Gibson, Frank Grillo, Mike Colter, Reid Scott, Deon Taylor, Peter A. Dowling , Peter A. Dowling.
